thread.title: Subramanian Swamy dubs JNU students, professors as ‘naxals’
thread.title_full: Subramanian Swamy dubs JNU students, professors as ‘naxals’ | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Subramanian Swamy dubs JNU students, professors as ‘naxals’
text:
Other Articles Meizu Pro 5 flagship smartphone launched in China, features Exynos 7420 processor, 3GB RAM Swamy's remark about JNU students shows frustration, says AAP Political wave in Bihar will turn into tsunami after PM Modi's arrival, says BJP Bharatiya Janata party ( BJP ) leader Subramanian Swamy has made another controversial remark by calling the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) students and professors “naxalites.”
“Not only students, I am also calling JNU professors as naxal,” said Swamy while responding to a question here on Friday.
Speaking on his recommendation to change the name of JNU to Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose University, he said that Bose was far more educated as compared to Nehru.
 26, 2015 11:42 am
